item.title: Aspose.HTML for .NET 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.HTML for .NET 24.1. As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the January release of Aspose.HTML for .NET. In this release, we have Improved the quality of HTML document processing. We also improved the quality of parsing and processing CSS styles, treatment the Flex, the Inline and the Table elements.
